title: Keycloak 24.0.5 released
content: To download the release go to .   HIGHLIGHTS   SECURITY ISSUE WITH PAR CLIENTS USING CLIENT_SECRET_POST BASED AUTHENTICATION  This release contains the fix of the important security issue affecting some OIDC confidential clients using PAR (Pushed authorization request). In case you use OIDC confidential clients together with PAR and you use client authentication based on client_id and client_secret sent as parameters in the HTTP request body (method client_secret_post specified in the OIDC specification), it is highly encouraged to rotate the client secrets of your clients after upgrading to this version.   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Use cache.compute() method to improve the replace retry loop  * Update Create Realm in Keycloak 24 Getting Started   BUGS   * JGroups creates log messages as it switched internally to "trace"    dist/quarkus  * LDAP user creation reports error but user is created ldap  * Clicking the "save" button multiple times in the Saml IDP configuration page    corrupts the value of "AuthnContext ClassRefs" admin/ui  * Empty CSP header value breaks security filter authentication  * Cypress tests store videos even for passing tests ci  * Maven clean build doesn't clean admin client generated files ci  * Cypress failing on video recording ci  * Database driver install examples can lead to permission errors in some    circumstances docs
